basic_information.scholarship_name: Connor Hicks Memorial Endowed Music Scholarship

description: This scholarship was established in 2018 by Ronnie Hicks in honor of his son Connor Hicks. Connor, a songwriter, musician and former ACM@UCO student, passed away unexpectedly in 2017 at the age of 20. He was a member of the Chickasaw Nation and an administrative aide for the Chickasaw Nation Office of Governmental Affairs. Preference will be given to ACM@UCO performance majors and to Native American students, with additional preference given to a Member of the Chickasaw Nation (CDIB card required). Preference is also given to previous recipients. Eligibility ACM@UCO major Sophomore, junior or senior Enrolled full time (12+ hours undergraduate, 9+ hours graduate) Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript CDIB card (if applicable) Selection Process Preference given to a contemporary music performance major, member of the Chickasaw Nation, Native American student, and/or previous recipients (in that order)
